title: Tree Borrows
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Trees are now borrowing your code, and you're paying the interest in bugs.

title: IKEA ditches Zigbee for Thread going all in on Matter smart homes
author: thunderbong
aiHeadline: IKEA finally realizes Zigbee was a dead end, so they're switching to Thread, because who doesn't love a good threadbare smart home?

title: Linda Yaccarino is leaving X
author: donohoe
aiHeadline: Linda Yaccarino is leaving X, because even she can't handle the chaos anymore.

title: Most RESTful APIs aren't really RESTful
author: BerislavLopac
aiHeadline: Most RESTful APIs are about as RESTful as a cat in a room full of lasers.

title: Astro is a return to the fundamentals of the web
author: pumbaa
aiHeadline: Astro takes us back to the web's roots, where the only thing faster than your code was the dial-up modem.
